message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's in great condition and worth a lot more to me, but I'm willing to negotiate. Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, thank you for considering my offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate you letting me know your price point. While I value your interest, $120 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $140. This would still be a good deal for both of us. What do you think?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I am unable to go above $120 for the product. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
